div.ab:
ــه من أهل مدينة
ــه إردب وسبعة عــشر
إردب قمح توفّياها في الهري
لضريبة الطّعام سنة سبع وثمنين منف
وكتبه عبد اللّه بن جرير في ذي القعدة
سنة ســبع وثمنين
÷
ومبلغــها ست مئة وسبعة عشر وثلثي إردب قمح
÷÷÷÷

*** ***h min ʾahli madīnaẗi ***
*** ***aẗ ʾirdabb:in wa sabʿaẗa ʿašara
ʾirdabb qamḥ:in tawaffayā hā fī ăl huryi
li ḍarībaẗi ăṭ ṭaʿāmi sanaẗa sabʿ:in wa manfa ṯamānīna
*** wa kataba hu ʿabdu ăl lāhi bnu ǧarīr:in fī ḏī ăl qaʿdaẗi
*** sanaẗ sabʿ:in wa ṯamānīna
***
***
***
***
***
*** 7 *
***
wa mablaġu hā sittu miʾaẗ:in wa sabʿaẗa ʿašara wa ṯulṯay ʾirdabbi qamḥ:in
*** 617+2/3

] numbering among the people of the town of ......[
..].. artabas and sevente[en ]
artab]as of wheat, which they both have received in full in the barns Die beiden haben sie (die Artaben) voll empfangen
[for the corn-tax (embolé) of the year] eighty-[seven], für die Naturalabgabe (griech. ἐμβολή) des Jahres siebenundachtzig.
[and] ʿAbdallâh b. Ǧarîr [has written it] in Ḏû'l-Qaʿda
[of the year] eighty-[se]ven.
In the name of God, Omar, son of Abip, and [...... the superintendents]
of the public barns at Babylon, to you, peo[ple of ]
You have delivered to us for the present fifth indiction through the......[ ... ]
of the village, 617 2/3 artabas of wheat, six hundred and sev[en]teen [and two thirds]
Phaophi of the fifth indiction. .......... [
7 (?) [
That makes 617 2/3 artabas of wheat,
[the amount] thereof (being) six hundred and seventeen and thwo thirds of artabas of wheat.
617 2/3
